cause.description:
Kids with disabilities suffer.
Bloorview Kids Rehab has helped 7,000 kids this year. They rank #1 in n children’s rehab and complex care.
The vision is that children with disabilities will see the world – and be seen by the world – in a new way.
Bloorview Kids Rehab is dedicated to enabling children and youth with disabilities and special needs to achieve their personal best.
Support Bloorview Kids.
http://www.bloorview.ca/index.php
http://www.bloorview.ca/newsroom/stories/documents/sunarticles.pdf
Donate: http://www.bloorview.ca/foundation/donating/index.php (Donate button will donate to International Disability Centre based in the U.S until further notice)
1. Defying disability is a possibility.

3. Support Bloorview Kids Rehab.
